meanings.definition: To convert to the use of diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic was dieselizing the old truck to make it more efficient.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to dieselize their fleet for cost savings.
meanings.sent3: The idea of dieselizing a lawnmower seemed strange at first, but it worked well.
meanings.sent4: She was dieselizing her lifestyle, slowly making eco-friendly changes.
meanings.sent5: The process of dieselizing the generator was noisy but worth it in the end.

meanings.definition: The process of adapting or modifying something to run on diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: Dieselizing of the buses was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The dieselizing of the factory machinery increased its efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The dieselizing of the boat turned it into a fuel-efficient vessel.
meanings.sent4: The dieselizing of the generator saved a lot of money on fuel costs.
meanings.sent5: The dieselizing of the tractor was a major project for the farm.
